h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Find Red Loong - Chapter 1 Secret Dragon Boss
content: Jump over the tree branch and head toward the waterfall and the enemy waiting outside of it. If you have the Loong Scales, you’ll see an Examine prompt appear, but you’ll need to deal with the nearby enemy first. When the area is clear, press Examine to make the waterfall disappear and a hole in the wall will appear.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Red Loong - Chapter 1 Secret Dragon Boss'.
The content is as follows:
Jump over the tree branch and head toward the waterfall and the enemy waiting outside of it. If you have the Loong Scales, you’ll see an Examine prompt appear, but you’ll need to deal with the nearby enemy first. When the area is clear, press Examine to make the waterfall disappear and a hole in the wall will appear.
